location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区东厂胡同北巷1号
location.en: No. 1 Dongchang Hutong North Lane, Dongcheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个民主党派，在中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商制度中是排名第二的参政党。
description.en: A democratic party in the People's Republic of China, ranking as the second-largest participating party within the multi-party cooperation and political consultation system led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的创建者和早期领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国中央人民政府副主席。
description.en: One of the founders and early leaders of the China Democratic League, served as Vice Chairman of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的创建者和早期领导人之一，曾任中国民主同盟中央委员会主席、最高人民法院院长。
description.en: One of the founders and early leaders of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League and President of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的创建者和早期领导人之一，在1957年反右运动中被划为“大右派”。
description.en: One of the founders and early leaders of the China Democratic League, labeled as a 'major rightist' during the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟现任中央主席，第十三、十四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: The current Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League, and Vice Chairman of the 13th and 14th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的前身组织。
description.en: The predecessor organization of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，中国民主同盟的诞生地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期成员党派，后因参加制宪国民大会而被开除。
description.en: An early member party of the China Democratic League, later expelled for participating in the Constituent National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期成员党派，后改称中国民主社会党。
description.en: An early member party of the China Democratic League, later renamed the China Democratic Social Party.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国家社会党改名而来，后因参加制宪国民大会而被开除出中国民主同盟。
description.en: Renamed from the China National Socialist Party, later expelled from the China Democratic League for participating in the Constituent National Assembly.

nodes.id: 中华民族解放行动委员会

zh-cn: 中华民族解放行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期成员党派，后改称中国农工民主党。
description.en: An early member party of the China Democratic League, later renamed the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 由中华民族解放行动委员会改名而来，曾为中国民主同盟成员，后脱离成为独立党派。
description.en: Renamed from the Chinese National Liberation Action Committee, formerly a member of the China Democratic League, later split off to become an independent party.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期成员团体之一。
description.en: One of the early member groups of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期成员团体之一。
description.en: One of the early member groups of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期成员团体之一。
description.en: One of the early member groups of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 1946年由中国国民党主导召开的会议，因民盟内部党派单独参加，导致民盟与国民党关系恶化。
description.en: A conference dominated by the Kuomintang in 1946. The separate participation by parties within the China Democratic League led to the deterioration of relations between the League and the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府时期的全国最高民意咨询机关，统一建国同志会在此背景下发起。
description.en: The highest national consultative body during the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, against the backdrop of which the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui was initiated.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟前身统一建国同志会的发起人之一，曾任中国民主政团同盟中央执行委员会主席。
description.en: One of the initiators of the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui, the predecessor of the China Democratic League, and served as the Chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the China Democratic Political Groups League.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟的早期领导人之一，在1957年反右运动中被划为“大右派”。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the China Democratic League, labeled as a 'major rightist' during the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟早期领导人，曾主持民盟机关报《光明报》。
description.en: An early leader of the China Democratic League who once presided over its official newspaper, the 'Guangming Daily'.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主政团同盟的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the China Democratic Political Groups League.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，对包括民盟在内的民主党派进行政治领导。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which provides political leadership to the democratic parties, including the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，曾在1947年宣布民盟为非法团体。
description.en: One of the main political parties of the Republic of China, which declared the China Democratic League an illegal organization in 1947.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1947年时由中国国民党执政的政府，宣布民盟为非法团体。
description.en: The government ruled by the Kuomintang in 1947, which declared the China Democratic League an illegal organization.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第一代中央领导集体的核心，1949年后建议保留民盟等民主党派。
description.en: The core of the first generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, who suggested preserving the democratic parties, including the China Democratic League, after 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席、中华人民共和国司法部部长。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL and Minister of Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央代理主席、中华人民共和国文化部部长。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Acting Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL and Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的中央政府机构，多位民盟领导人在此任职。
description.en: The central government body of the People's Republic of China in its early years, where several leaders of the China Democratic League held positions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发动的政治运动，大量民盟成员被划为“右派”，对民盟造成严重打击。
description.en: A political campaign launched in mainland China in 1957, during which a large number of China Democratic League members were labeled as 'rightists', dealing a severe blow to the league.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席，在反右运动中被划为“右派”。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL, and was labeled a 'rightist' during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1957年发生于湖北省汉阳县第一中学的事件，民盟成员杨焕尧因此事件被判处死刑。
description.en: An incident that occurred in 1957 at Hanyang No. 1 Middle School in Hubei Province, which led to the death sentence of China Democratic League member Yang Huanyao.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟盟员，在1957年汉阳一中事件后被判处死刑。
description.en: A member of the China Democratic League who was sentenced to death after the 1957 Hanyang No. 1 Middle School incident.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国大陆发生的政治运动，期间民盟各级组织停止活动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China from 1966 to 1976, during which all levels of the China Democratic League's organizations ceased activities.

description.zh-cn: 标志文化大革命结束的政治事件，此后民盟逐步恢复组织活动。
description.en: A political event marking the end of the Cultural Revolution, after which the China Democratic League gradually resumed its organizational activities.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟领导人，曾任民盟中央主席。
description.en: A leader of the China Democratic League, served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the CDL.

description.zh-cn: 张澜是中国民主同盟的主要创始人之一。
description.en: Zhang Lan was one of the main founders of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 沈钧儒是中国民主同盟的主要创始人之一。
description.en: Shen Junru was one of the main founders of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧是中国民主同盟的主要创始人之一。
description.en: Zhang Bojun was one of the main founders of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国民主同盟由其前身统一建国同志会改建而成。
description.en: The China Democratic League was restructured from its predecessor, the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui.

description.zh-cn: 张澜是统一建国同志会的发起人之一。
description.en: Zhang Lan was one of the initiators of the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui.

description.zh-cn: 黄炎培是统一建国同志会的发起人之一。
description.en: Huang Yanpei was one of the initiators of the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui.

description.zh-cn: 沈钧儒是统一建国同志会的发起人之一。
description.en: Shen Junru was one of the initiators of the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui.

description.zh-cn: 罗隆基是统一建国同志会的发起人之一。
description.en: Luo Longji was one of the initiators of the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui.

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧是统一建国同志会的发起人之一。
description.en: Zhang Bojun was one of the initiators of the Tongyi Jianguo Tongzhihui.

description.zh-cn: 中国青年党是中国民主同盟的创始成员党派之一，于1946年被开除。
description.en: The Chinese Youth Party was one of the founding member parties of the China Democratic League and was expelled in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家社会党是中国民主同盟的创始成员党派之一，后改名为中国民主社会党并于1946年被开除。
description.en: The China National Socialist Party was one of the founding member parties of the China Democratic League, later renamed the China Democratic Social Party and was expelled in 1946.

relationships.source: 中华民族解放行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民族解放行动委员会是中国民主同盟的创始成员党派之一，后改名中国农工民主党并脱离联盟。
description.en: The Chinese National Liberation Action Committee was one of the founding member parties of the China Democratic League, later renamed the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party and left the league.

description.zh-cn: 中华职业教育社是中国民主同盟的创始成员团体之一。
description.en: The China Vocational Education Society was one of the founding member groups of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 中国乡村建设协会是中国民主同盟的创始成员团体之一。
description.en: The China Rural Construction Association was one of the founding member groups of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 全国各界救国联合会是中国民主同盟的创始成员团体之一。
description.en: The National Salvation Association of All Circles was one of the founding member groups of the China Democratic League.

description.zh-cn: 因单独参加南京制宪国民大会，中国青年党被中国民主同盟开除。
description.en: The Chinese Youth Party was expelled from the China Democratic League for unilaterally participating in the Nanjing Constituent National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 因单独参加南京制宪国民大会，中国民主社会党被中国民主同盟开除。
description.en: The China Democratic Social Party was expelled from the China Democratic League for unilaterally participating in the Nanjing Constituent National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 1948年1月，民盟公开宣布与中国共产党合作，共同反对国民党的一党专政。
description.en: In January 1948, the China Democratic League publicly announced its cooperation with the Communist Party of China to jointly oppose the Kuomintang's one-party dictatorship.

description.zh-cn: 1947年10月，由国民党执政的中华民国政府宣布民盟为“非法团体”。
description.en: In October 1947, the Government of the Republic of China, led by the Kuomintang, declared the China Democratic League an 'illegal organization'.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中华人民共和国成立后，民盟接受中国共产党的政治领导，成为参政党。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, the China Democratic League accepted the political leadership of the Communist Party of China and became a participating political party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，毛泽东建议包括民盟在内的八个民主党派继续保留下来。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Mao Zedong suggested that the eight democratic parties, including the China Democratic League, should be preserved.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 张澜当选为中央人民政府副主席。
description.en: Zhang Lan was elected as Vice Chairman of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 沈钧儒出任最高人民法院院长。
description.en: Shen Junru served as the President of the Supreme People's Court.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧出任政务院部长。
description.en: Zhang Bojun served as a minister in the Government Administration Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 史良出任政务院部长。
description.en: Shi Liang served as a minister in the Government Administration Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 胡愈之出任政务院部长。
description.en: Hu Yuzhi served as a minister in the Government Administration Council.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年的反右运动中，许多民盟成员被划为“右派”，民盟从此一蹶不振。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, many members of the China Democratic League were labeled as 'rightists', and the league suffered a major setback from which it never fully recovered.

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧在反右运动中被划为“大右派”。
description.en: Zhang Bojun was labeled a 'major rightist' during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 罗隆基在反右运动中被划为“大右派”。
description.en: Luo Longji was labeled a 'major rightist' during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 费孝通在反右运动中被划为“右派”。
description.en: Fei Xiaotong was labeled a 'rightist' during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 因在学校发展盟员等原因，盟员杨焕尧在汉阳一中事件中被以现行反革命判处死刑立即执行。
description.en: Due to reasons such as recruiting league members at school, league member Yang Huanyao was sentenced to immediate execution for counter-revolutionary activities during the Hanyang No. 1 Middle School incident.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，民盟各级组织被迫停止活动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, all levels of the China Democratic League's organizations were forced to cease their activities.

description.zh-cn: “粉碎四人帮”事件后，民盟逐步恢复组织活动。
description.en: After the 'Smashing of the Gang of Four', the China Democratic League gradually resumed its organizational activities.

position.en: Chairman of the Central Executive Committee

description.zh-cn: 黄炎培担任中国民主政团同盟第一任主席，后辞职。
description.en: Huang Yanpei served as the first Chairman of the China Democratic Political Groups League, and later resigned.

description.zh-cn: 张澜自1941年起长期担任中国民主同盟主席，直至1955年逝世。
description.en: Zhang Lan served as the Chairman of the China Democratic League for a long period from 1941 until his death in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 沈钧儒在张澜逝世后担任代理主席，后正式当选主席，直至1963年逝世。
description.en: Shen Junru served as Acting Chairman after the death of Zhang Lan, was later officially elected Chairman, and held the position until his death in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 杨明轩在沈钧儒逝世后担任代理主席，后正式当选主席。
description.en: Yang Mingxuan served as Acting Chairman after the death of Shen Junru, and was later officially elected Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 史良在民盟恢复活动后当选为中央委员会主席，直至1985年逝世。
description.en: Shi Liang was elected Chairman of the Central Committee after the China Democratic League resumed its activities, serving until her death in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 胡愈之在史良逝世后担任代理主席，直至1986年病逝。
description.en: Hu Yuzhi served as Acting Chairman after the death of Shi Liang, until his own death in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 楚图南在胡愈之逝世后担任代理主席，后正式当选主席。
description.en: Chu Tunan served as Acting Chairman after the death of Hu Yuzhi, and was later officially elected Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 费孝通自1987年起担任民盟中央主席，直至1996年辞职。
description.en: Fei Xiaotong served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League from 1987 until his resignation in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 丁石孙自1996年起担任民盟中央主席。
description.en: Ding Shisun served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League from 1996.

description.zh-cn: 蒋树声自2005年起担任民盟中央主席。
description.en: Jiang Shusheng served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League from 2005.

description.zh-cn: 张宝文自2012年起担任民盟中央主席。
description.en: Zhang Baowen served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League from 2012.

description.zh-cn: 丁仲礼自2017年起担任民盟中央主席。
description.en: Ding Zhongli has served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Democratic League since 2017.
